oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 1980 Fiddle Contest: Hosted by Randy Howard - Tape 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is of Randy Howard (host) hosting a number of fiddle performances. The fist recording is of a fiddle contest. The second recording is of a group comprised of: Randy Crouch (musician), Tim Crouch (musician), Dennis Crouch (musician), and Aubrey Hayney (musician) performing a band recording session. The tape is from an unknown date in 1980. The tape is labeled tape one of three.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Randy Howard; Randy Crouch; Tim Crouch; Dennis Crouch; Aubrey Hayney
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Randy Howard introduces contestant number nine to perform his fiddle tunes -- (00:19) 40 Years Ago Waltz ([Unidentified]) -- (03:33) Done Gone ([Unidentified]) -- (05:51) Hot Foot ([Unidentified]) -- (08:03) Like Father, Like Son ([Unidentified]) -- (10:11) (Unidentified fiddle tune) ([Unidentified]) -- (12:35) Randy Howard introduces contestant number three to perform his fiddle tune -- (12:42) (Unidentified fiddle tune) ([Unidentified]) -- (14:26) Randy Crouch introduces "The Waltz for Us" -- (14:38) The Waltz for Us (Randy Crouch, Tim Crouch, and Dennis Crouch) -- (18:29) Chief Sitting Bull (Randy Crouch, Tim Crouch, Dennis Crouch, and Aubrey Hayney) -- (22:05) Kentucky Waltz (Randy Crouch, Tim Crouch, Dennis Crouch, and Aubrey Hayney) -- (25:51) (Unidentified fiddle tune) (Randy Crouch, Tim Crouch, Dennis Crouch, and Aubrey Hayney)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Howard, Randy; Crouch, Randy; Crouch, Tim; Crouch, Dennis; Hayney, Aubrey;
